aththamma thawa thawa dodamalu weyi ..kathawe ithiriyata mage sinawa nam nawathwa gatha nohaki wanneya .ee nam aththammage ,na sanuharen thagi labuna mahana mashime kathawataya ..dawadda lesa goda mada idam ,kanakara abarana lada aa thagi lesa ,age prabhu mama kenekugen mahana mashimak thagi laba atha.thundeniye aththammage niwasa pihiti kadu gataye sita pahalatath ,ethan sita wel ipanali mathinuth , palleweladi raja ala wella mathinuth ,pallewela aththammage aluth gedara dakwama ,ee mahana mashima ,ilandarin kipa palak wisin ,atharamanga wateminda osawagena aa bawa oo kiyaddi ,kese nam ma sina mada sitinnada ??
